response.overview: A true-life drama in the 1920s, centering on British explorer Col. Percy Fawcett, who discovered evidence of a previously unknown, advanced civilization in the Amazon and disappeared whilst searching for it.
response.tagline: A man's reach should exceed his grasp... or what's a heaven for?
response.title: The Lost City of Z

release_dates.note: RiverRun International Film Festival & San Francisco International Film Festival
